column2: "Da kor bi
column3: Peter nye John siaan anan kɔr asɔrfi no mu ewiaber ndɔnebiasa mpaabɔ ber no mu."

column2: "Nna barimba bi wɔ hɔ a wɔwoo no obubuafo a daa wɔdze no bɔto asɔrfi abotsen a wɔfrɛ no Fɛɛfɛw no ano
column3: ama ɔaaserɛ hɔn a wɔrokɔ asɔrfi no mu no adze."

column2: "Ɔno na ohun Peter nye John dɛ wɔrekɛhɛn asɔrfi no mu no
column3: obisaa hɔn hɔ akyɛdze."

column2: "Na Peter dze n'enyiwa tsiim no do
column3: na John so dɛmara

column2: "Na ɔhwɛɛ hɔn komm
column3: nna osusu dɛ oribenya biribi efi hɔn hɔ."

column2: "Na Peter see no dɛ
column3: Sika nye dwetɛ dze
column5: na dza mowɔ na medze rema wo yi. Nazarɛtnyi Jesus Kraest ne dzin mu

column2: "Na osuoo ne nsa nyimfa mu maa no do
column3: na amonmu hɔ ara n'anansa nye n'anamɔn mu yɛɛ dzen."

column2: "Na ohuruwii gyinae
column3: na ɔnantsewee; na ɔnye hɔn kɔr asɔrfi no mu

column2: "Na nkorɔfo nyina hun no dɛ ɔnam na oriyi Nyankopɔn ayɛw."
"Na wohunii so dɛ ɔnoara nye nyia adzeserɛ ntsi ɔtsena Abow a wɔfrɛ no Fɛɛfɛw no ano no; na adze a ayɛ no no ntsi nwanwa nye ahobow hyɛɛ hɔn ma."
"Ber a nna ɔtetar Peter na John ho no
column3: nkorɔfo nyina tutuu mbirika behyiaa hɔn nkyɛn wɔ abrandaa a wɔfrɛ no Solomon dze no no do

column2: "Na Peter hunii no
column3: obuaa nkorɔfo no dɛ
column5: Ɔyɛ dɛn na iyi yɛ hom nwanwa
column6: anaadɛ ɔyɛ dɛn na hom hwɛ hɛn hann
column7: dɛ gyama hɛnankasa hɛn tum anaa hɛn sompa na yɛdze maa ɔnantsewee yi?"

column2: "Abraham nye Isaak nye Jakob hɔn Nyankopɔn
column3: hɛn egyanom Nyankopɔn
column4: na ɔahyɛ n'Akowaa  Jesus enyimnyam; ɔno a hom yii no mae
column5: na hom poow no wɔ Pilate a obuu atsɛn dɛ nkyɛ obegyaa no no enyim no."

column2: "Na hom poow Krɔnkrɔnnyi nye Tseneneenyi no
column3: na hom serɛɛ dɛ wɔmfa owudzifo nkyɛ hom

column2: "na nkwa Hen no dze
column3: hom kum no; ɔno na Nyankopɔn nyaan no fii ewufo mu: ɔno ho adasefo nye hɛn."

column2: "Na ɔnam ne dzin mu gyedzi do na ne dzin do na ama oyi a hom hu no na hom nyim no yi atse apɔw: nyew
column3: gyedzi a ɔnam no do na ɔama no ahosan koraa dɛm wɔ hom nyina enyim yi."

column2: "Na afei
column3: enuanom
column4: minyim dɛ hom nnyim ntsi na hom yɛe
column5: dɛ mbrɛ hom etsitsir so yɛe."

column2: "Na dza Nyankopɔn nam no nkɔnhyɛfo nyina anomu kae too hɔ dɛ otwar dɛ ne Kraest no bohu amandze no
column3: aba mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hom nnu homho
column3: na hom ndan mbra Nyankopɔn hɔ
column4: ama wɔaapepa hom bɔn efi hom ho
column6: "ama dɛm no Ewuradze aama hom ahotɔ mber
column7: na ɔaasoma Kraest a woeyi no esi hɔ ama hom dada no

column2: "ɔno na ɔsɛ dɛ ɔsor gye no sie
column3: dze kodu ndzɛmba nyina ahyɛnanmu ber a Nyankopɔn nam no nkɔnhyɛfo krɔnkrɔn a wɔwɔ hɔ fi tsetse no hɔn anomu kae no."

column2: "Na Moses kaa dɛ
column3: Nkɔnhyɛnyi bi na Ewuradze Nyankopɔn bɛma no do ama hom wɔ hom enuanom mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ ɔmaa emi so do no: ɔno na hom ntsie no wɔ dza ɔbɛka akyerɛ hom nyina mu."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ ɔkra biara a onnketsie nkɔnhyɛnyi no
column3: wɔbɛsɛɛ no efi ɔman no mu."

column2: "Ɛhɛɛ
column3: nkɔnhyɛfo nyina a wofi Samuel do nye hɔn a wodzi do no dodow a wɔkasae no
column4: hɔn so kaa nda yi ho asɛm."

column2: "Hom nye nkɔnhyɛfo no nye ahyɛmu a Nyankopɔn nye hom egyanom dzii no mba
column3: osiandɛ ɔsee Abraham dɛ
column4: W'asefo mu na wobehyira asaase do ebusua biara."

column2: "Hom na Nyankopɔn nyaan n'akowaa no
column3: odzii kan somaa no hom nkyɛn dɛ ombehyira hom
column4: dɛ ɔmbɛdan hom nyina mfi hom emumuyɛ mu."
